title: 备忘：FRONTIERS OF ECONOMICS IN CHINA 论文一篇
content:
Shusong Ba, Shanshan Shen:

Research on China’s Export Structure to the US: Analysis Based
on the US Economic Growth and Exchange Rate,

 Frontiers of Economics in China, Volume
5,Number 3,September 2010,P339－335，Higher Education Press and
Springer-Velag 2010

 

相关论文中文本刊载于《中国工业经济》2009年第五期，P15－24，

“要翻墙，用赛风”.
